reviewText: This dvd is AWESOME!!! Mike Awesome tells it all. From his early days to his days in WWE,ECW,WCW & FMW. He also talks about his jump from ECW to WCW. This is a must have for every Mike Awesome fan in the world. He may have made some bad choices in the past but you have to admit that he was a great wrestler and held many titles around the world. Overall,If you like or love Mike Awesome big time? Buy this dvd. I know I will. I give this dvd a 10 out of 10.
